title: Beautiful 3 Bedroom 2 1/2 Bath Home on 1.34 Acres For Rent!
description: Built in 1984, this Lovely Colonial home is located on a partially wooded lot in a charming neighborhood. This 3+ Bedroom, 2 ½ Bath home has been renovated and/or updated inside and out. Besides all new flooring and new interior painting, it boasts 2 1/2 New Baths and New Kitchen with all new Cabinets, Quartz Counter Tops, as well as new stove and microwave. The kitchen features a spacious center island, and two pantry closets. Adjacent to the kitchen is a roomy breakfast area that opens to the impressive family room complete with a large brick direct-vent wood fireplace, a great place to relax and unwind. The french doors lead you out to your new, low-maintenance Trex deck with step down patio. The main floor also features a formal dining room and living room with abundant natural lighting. The Open Floor Plan will make it a great place to entertain too. A second brick chimney, is located between the dining room and living room, with an electric wood stove. The powder room is centrally located in the hallway between the main entrance foyer and kitchen. Upstairs there are two bonus rooms (or extra bedroom), great for an office, entertainment kids' room, or exercise area. The sliding glass doors access your second floor balcony, which overlooks the beautiful backyard and local wild life. A great place to sit and enjoy your morning coffee or an evening cocktail. The Master Suite, with all newly renovated bedroom and bathroom, boasts a beautiful walk-in marble shower and dual-swing glass door. New recessed lighting, and accent lighting are found throughout this lovely home as well. The Second Bath, located in the 2nd floor hallway, is also newly renovated. The laundry is located on the first floor in the mud room along with a utility sink, just off the 2 Car Garage. The Garage has an additional area with upper and lower wood cabinetry/work bench, great for any of your projects. This home is truly turn key! Newer Air Conditioning and Heating Systems were recently installed. There is also an electric attic fan located on the second floor. You will be glad you decided to tour this amazing home once you see all it has to offer. Just a short walk from Evansburg State Park with 2,000+ acres of available hiking, biking, picnic areas, horseback riding, play ground, and fishing in the Skippack Creek, to name a few. Minutes from charming downtown Skippack Village with it's delightful 36+ Specialty Shoppes and 28+ Restaurants. Just minutes away from Providence Town Shopping Center, that includes Wegman's Grocery Store, Movie Tavern Theatre, and many other shopping, entertainment, and dining establishments. Exit 13 of the Northeast Extension, PA Turnpike and Route 422 are only minutes away. Located in a highly sought after area, this home is also in Perkiomen Valley School District. This house is definitely a MUST SEE!

title: 1513 Ridge Ave *** Elegant Vintage Charm: Spacious Philadelphia Abode!
description:
We are pleased to present a spacious 2-bedroom plus sunroom/den and 1-bathroom apartment, located at 1513 Ridge Ave, Philadelphia. Situated on the upper level of a duplex, the property boasts approximately 1,700 square feet of refined living space, with only one tenant residing below.
This elegant vintage apartment features hardwood flooring, tasteful moldings, and French doors that contribute to its classic charm. The generous living room includes a cozy fireplace, while the sunroom can serve as a den or office. The dining room is accessible through additional French doors, and the unit also offers a butler's pantry and breakfast room. The vintage kitchen comes fully equipped to meet your culinary needs.

title: Fantastic 2 Bed House in Fishtown with Outdoor Space and Laundry
description:
This is a fantastic 2 bedroom / 1 bathroom single family home in the heart of Fishtown! Features include central air, hardwood floors, fenced in yard, in-unit washer and dryer, and beautiful finishes throughout. title: Northern Liberties Huge 2 Bedroom Loft with Parking Included
description:
This modern industrial style loft has been renovated throughout and features loads of amenities sure to make your life a breeze. Enter the unit on the 2nd floor and you will immediately be impressed by the polished concrete floors throughout, the grand 13 ft. ceilings with exposed ducts, ample lighting and magnificent city views.
The main hall features a deep coat closet and access to the half bathroom, featuring a modern fluted vanity, composite top, black fixtures and decorative accents and pocket door to the primary bathroom. The custom eat-in kitchen is newly renovated with stainless steel appliances, built-in pantry, two-tone white/natural wood shaker cabinetry with a navy center island with breakfast bar & statement pendant light, quartz countertops, built-in wine rack, command center with bench seating and more!
The kitchen opens into the family room offering grand views of the City from the impressive floor-to-windows with Juliet balcony. Sit back and relax with a mounted TV or enjoy time with guests in the spacious room. This kitchen/family room combo provides access to the two bedrooms.
Master bedroom is off of the kitchen, with two deep double closets for ample storage. The primary bathroom adjoins this room for a full en-suite experience. Here you’ll find a modern, wooden fluted vanity with composite top, tub/shower, black finishes and decorative accents, and stacked washer/dryer. The 2nd bedroom is accented with a stunning, mid-century modern sputnik light and features ample wardrobe storage space.
That’s not all! This stunning condo comes with gated parking, onsite 24 hour gym with full track, and a 24 hour front desk attendant for top-notch convenience AND security. Best of all, you’re blocks away from shopping, cafes, restaurants, and nightlife in both Northern Liberties and Old City!
Listing courtesy of Keller Williams Real Estate

title: Shop, Eat, Sleep and More at Park Lane!!
description:
Apt. 2410 — Oxford floor plan — 1,203 sq. ft. — $3,460
This 4th floor 2-bedroom/2-bathroom apartment home has much to offer! It comes upgraded with hardwood LVT flooring, central heat and air, upgraded stainless steel appliances, and a lovely tile backsplash!
